newsitem.title: USA: AMEX to trade three new options next week.
newsitem.headline: AMEX to trade three new options next week.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange said Wednesday it will begin trading options on Alberto-Culver Co and InVision Technologies Inc on June 2 and on American Depositary Receipts (ADRs) of IONA Technologies Plc on June 3.

The exchange said Alberto-Culver options will have opening strike prices of 25, 30 and 35, with initial expirations in June, July, October and January. Position limits have been set at 4,500 contracts.
Spear, Leeds & Kellogg will be the specialist.
For InVision Technologies options, opening strikes have been set at 12-1/2, 15 and 17-1/2, with position limits of 4,500 contracts. AGS Specialist Partners has been named specialist.
Options on Ireland's IONA Technologies will open with strikes of 15, 17-1/2 and 20, with initial expirations in June, July, September, December. Position limits have been set at 7,500 contracts.
Spear, Leeds & Kellogg has been named the specialist.
